commitResults.messageTitle: Duke.java: Rename chatbot name from Duke to Tom
commitResults.messageBody:
Changes made:
* File name is renamed from Duke.java to Tom.java
to remove all traces of Duke from the source code.

* Ascii art prining Duke has been changed to Tom.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tom.java: Add skeleton that greets user and exits.
Tom.java: Add echo functionality and exit on 'bye' command
commitResults.messageBody: Implement functionality to echo user input and terminate when 'bye' is entered.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tom.java: Add task storage and listing functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
* Chatbot will store up to 100 tasks on nonpersistent storage.
* Includes support for acknowledging added tasks.
* Tasks are listed on command "list".

commitResults.messageTitle: Tom.java: Refactor if-elseif to switch case
commitResults.messageBody:
Refactored the if-elseif statements into a switch-case structure.
This change makes it easier to add additional commands in the future.

commitResults.messageTitle: Task.java, Tom.java: Encapsulate task details in Task class
commitResults.messageBody:
Task.java implements task details.

Tom.java abstracts the task-strings into a dedicated Task class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tom.java: correct format of Ascii Art
Tom.java: add mark and unmark commands
Tom.java: Add template for todo, deadline, event commands
